content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TIPOPG,count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/recebimentos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
group by TIPOPG


SELECT
    top 10 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/recebimentos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/listapedidos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TIPO,MES_PED, count(*), sum(QTITEM),sum(VL_FINAL)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/listapedidos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
group by TIPO,MES_PED


SELECT CLIENTE, TIPO, DIA_ABE, MES_ABE, VL_FINAL
    -- *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/historicopedidos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
 where FORMAPG is null and CLIENTE = 'Consumo-Julia' and VL_FINAL > 100

 SELECT
    CLIENTE, COUNT(*),sum(VL_FINAL)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/historicopedidos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
 where FORMAPG is null 
 group by CLIENTE 

SELECT
    FORMAPG, COUNT(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sagestaoloja.dfs.core.windows.net/trusted/historicopedidos/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
group by FORMAPG
